short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline WhatsApp/Telegram messaging without saving phone number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension streamlines your WhatsApp & Telegram messaging experience. Simply open the extension, enter a phone number, and choose WhatsApp or Telegram to be directed to the corresponding chat window.
